items.name: Death Caress
implicitMods: Inflict Fire Exposure on Hit, applying -13% to Fire Resistance
+13% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier
explicitMods: +8 to maximum Energy Shield
+87 to maximum Life
+42% to Lightning Resistance
+31% to Chaos Resistance
craftedMods: 25% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
fracturedMods: Ignites you inflict deal Damage 8% faster

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.
explicitMods: +1.9 metres to radius
You and nearby allies gain 16% increased Movement Speed
You and nearby allies gain 24% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain 24% increased Attack Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that create permanent auras around you, changing their reservation to a cost and making them temporary. Cannot support banner or stance skills.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 29% increased Aura effect
Supported Skills Cost +233 Mana

Supported Skills also count as Blessing Skills
You can only have one Aura on you from your Blessing Skills
Auras from Supported Skills have a base duration of 10.90 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that multiplies damage over time and increases skill effect duration of you and your allies.
explicitMods: +1.9 metres to radius
You and nearby allies deal 20% more Damage over Time
You and nearby allies have 19% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 74% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Polaric Devastation
explicitMods: 24% increased Global Critical Strike Chance
+37% to Fire Resistance
+32% to Cold Resistance
10% increased Duration of Ailments on Enemies
Left Ring slot: Cover Enemies in Ash for 5 seconds when you Ignite them
Right Ring slot: Cover Enemies in Frost for 5 seconds when you Freeze them
flavourText: Those that escaped the annihilating light

items.name: Taste of Hate
explicitMods: 11% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage during Effect
Gain 14% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage during effect
30% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Effect
30% chance to Avoid being Frozen during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A sip will freeze your lips,
A swig will chill your heart,
A glass will still your soul.

items.name: Atziri's Promise
explicitMods: Gain 8% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life during Effect
Gain 6% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: "Death needs not your understanding. It needs only your loyalty."

14% increased Movement Speed during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
